channel.title: My UX Case Studies
channel.description: Usually it's about my case studies, but not just that.

item.title: Shoor, Music Social Media App
item.description: Shoor is a social media application that is based on the Instagram and Spotify. One app for listening to music, make playlists, follow artists and watch their live performances.
item.author: address@yoursite.com (Mojtaba Yazdanpanah)

item.title: Housmart, Smart house app design
item.description: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology?
item.author: address@yoursite.com (Mojtaba Yazdanpanah)

item.title: PassiOne, a website about life coaches
item.description: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.
item.author: address@yoursite.com (Mojtaba Yazdanpanah)

item.title: Agah, smart sensor app
item.description: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on Github Flavored Markdown.
item.author: address@yoursite.com (Mojtaba Yazdanpanah)
